snippet: The 49ers’ Frank Gore, one of the N.F.L.’s best running backs, was never as good as he might have been in college because of injuries. But he overcame them — with the encouragement of others.
abstract: Profile of San Francisco 49ers running back Frank Gore, who is preparing with team for NFC championship game against Atlanta Falcons; Gore has overcome two significant knee injuries to become 49ers leading career rusher.
lead_paragraph: The 49ers’ Frank Gore, one of the N.F.L.’s best running backs, was never as good as he might have been in college because of injuries. But he overcame them — with the encouragement of others.

headline.seo: 49ers’ Frank Gore Was a Special Back as a College Freshman
headline.main: A Special Freshman Back, and Then Came the Injuries
headline.print_headline: A Special Freshman Back, and Then Came the Injuries
